long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A lightweight and elegant extension to save web pages for reading later. Organize your reading list with powerful features while maintaining a clean and intuitive interface.
Key Features:
- Quick Save: Save any webpage with a single click or using keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+L / Cmd+Shift+L)
- Custom Titles: Edit and customize titles of saved pages for better organization
- Smart Search: Quickly find saved pages with intelligent search across titles and URLs
- Sort Options: Toggle between newest-first and oldest-first sorting
- Dark Mode Support: Automatically adapts to your system's theme preference
- Font Customization: Choose from multiple font options for comfortable reading
- Offline Access: View your saved URLs even without internet connection
- Import/Export: Backup and restore your reading list as JSON file
- Badge Counter: Optional badge showing number of saved items
- Favicon Support: Visual identification with website icons
- Last Read Tracking: Keeps track of when you last opened each saved page
- Keyboard Navigation: Full keyboard support for power users
- Clean Interface: Minimalist design with smooth animations
- Bulk Actions: Clear all items with confirmation for list management
- Responsive Layout: Adapts perfectly to different window sizes
- Privacy Focused: All data stored locally on your device

Perfect for:
- Students collecting research materials
- Professionals saving articles for later
- Anyone who wants to organize their online reading
- Users who want to declutter their browser tabs

The extension is lightweight, fast, and respects your privacy by storing all data locally on your device. No account required, no tracking, just a simple and effective way to manage your reading list.
